alert.note: Alert for Bolivar (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued March 24 at 7:24PM CDT until March 24 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN BOLIVAR COUNTY... At 724 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Benoit, or 10 miles northwest of Shaw, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and golf ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. This dangerous storm will be near... Cleveland, Renova and Boyle around 740 PM CDT. Mound Bayou around 745 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this tornadic thunderstorm include Winstonville, Pace and Merigold. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
